desc: We are a Swedish company designing, manufacturing the original 'LiquiLevel' brand of tank liquid level indicators and tank level gauges. Our products are assembled and packaged and shipped to our network of Global customers. Originators of the LiquiLevel ST Tank Level indicator which is widely used for Rainwater Tanks

layout.text: The one and only Gauge Board and Tank Level indicator in the world to show accurate and true level, unlike other gauges which read 'back-to-front'
